articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from IIJI Director-General
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from IIJI Director-General

					Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea who is secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council, on a visit to the DPRK.
					
					Vishwanath handed the gift over to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits

					Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces led by Col. Gen. Ri Thae Chol left here on Tuesday to visit China.
					
					Meanwhile, the delegation of Kim Il Sung University headed by First Vice-President Kim Kyun, and the delegation of educational officials led by Pak Sun Dok, vice-minister of Common Education of the DPRK Education Commission, came back home on the same day after attending the international academic seminar at Beijing University  and visiting China.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Team Qualified for Asian Championships
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Team Qualified for Asian Championships

					Pyongyang, November 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK team drew Vietnamese rival 2:2 at qualifications for 2012 U-19 Asian Women's Football Championships Tuesday.
					
					The DPRK and Vietnam belong to group F. 
					
					The DPRK came first in the group, winning a berth for the championships.
